thread.title: Mets Ace Matt Harvey Apologizes For Missing Mandatory Workout
thread.title_full: Mets Ace Matt Harvey Apologizes For Missing Mandatory Workout

title: Mets Ace Matt Harvey Apologizes For Missing Mandatory Workout
text:
Get Sports Alerts 
7 Oct 2015 07:43 AM EST 
New York Mets ace Matt Harvey missed a mandatory team workout Tuesday at Citi Field ahead of the team’s first postseason appearance since 2006. Harvey apologized for the unexcused absence when he arrived at the stadium. It was later revealed he called Mets manager Terry Collins to say he was stuck in traffic on his way to the ballpark. Harvey said during a short press conference, “Obviously today was not the greatest. I know we had a mandatory workout. The last thing I ever want to do is not be here with my team. Basically there’s no excuse."
